resources.string: * Turn \'Use Current Location\' On, to always show the cinemas closest to your current location

Tickets can be picked up at the Cinema Box Office or Cinema ATM. Tickets will be available for pickup immediately following the online purchase up to the date of the performance. You must bring the same credit card used to purchase the tickets. Tickets are for general admission seating; there is no reserved seating. Please come early to ensure best seating. There are no refunds on tickets or service charges.
